title: DocuSign CLM: Overview
content: Who Uses DocuSign CLM? Our consulting firm for the CLM Implementation provided the below training in January 2025. They delivered the training to those who could in turn train the primary users of the platform. To review, the primary users of DocuSign CLM are: Authorized buyers within each department who will submit vendor quotes or renewals for review by the Business Development Procurement Team, Legal Team, Compliance Team, Digital Workplace Team, FP&A Team, and Digital Workplace team members for comments, red-lining, and approvals. Task Group members within Business Development, Financial Planning & Analysis, Accounting, and Digital Workplace teams who are responsible for reviewing the legal, compliance, financial, and security concerns for new and existing vendors. Sales personnel who will be able to view clients' IOs in the CLM (in addition to having a link to the DocuSign record in Salesforce via the DocuSign App Launcher <> Salesforce integration).
